name: Awesome GST Calculator Widget
author: Ankit Chugh

sections.description:
The plugin displays the GST Calculator widget anywhere you want with the help of a shortcode. The plugin is very easy to use as you just need to put the shortcode to any post, page, or sidebar in order to display the widget.
You can also add as a widget on your page in order to disply the calculator.

Shortcode: [wpgstcal]

NOTE: Please do clear or purge website cache after plugin activation.
sections.installation:
To install this plugin follow below steps

  1. Upload the plugin files to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Clear or purge website cache.
  4. Here we go, no other settings needed.
sections.faq:
Can this plugin calculate GST for multiple countries?

Yes, you just need to select the country from the dropdown.

Is this plugin paid or free?

This plugin is totally free.

What about support?

Create a support ticket at WordPress forum and I will take care of any issue.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Bug Fixed: Fixed Invalid json response issue on page/post update
  • Bug Fixed: Currency code label change on country dropdown change
